author: Cristina Henriquez
shortDescription: An exploration of the construction of the Panama Canal and the challenges faced by the individuals residing in its vicinity and participating in its building process.

author: Tana French
shortDescription: Sequel to *The Searcher*, this book follows former detective Cal Hooper's struggle to protect everything he's built in Ireland when his long-lost father appears searching for gold.

author: Ashley Elston
shortDescription: A newlywed couple investigates a series of murders along a deserted stretch of road after picking up an injured hitchhiker who dies.

author: Xochitl Gonzalez
shortDescription: A Latina art student at an Ivy League school discovers the work of a female artist who was mysteriously murdered a decade earlier.

author: Simone St. James
shortDescription: A newlywed couple investigates a series of murders along a deserted stretch of road after picking up an injured hitchhiker who dies.

author: Amy Tintera
shortDescription: When a popular true crime podcaster wants to cover her best friend's murder, a woman must help him even though she knows she might be guilty.

author: Stacy Willingham
shortDescription: When a popular true crime podcaster wants to cover her best friend's murder, a woman must help him even though she knows she might be guilty.
